validationErrors.alpha: The {{field}} field can only contain alphabetic characters
validationErrors.alphaNum: The {{field}} field can only contain alphanumeric characters
validationErrors.alphaDash: The {{field}} field can only contain alphanumeric characters, dashes and underscores
validationErrors.alphaSpaces: The {{field}} field can only contain alphabetic characters and spaces
validationErrors.between: The {{field}} field must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
validationErrors.digits: The {{field}} field must be exactly {{length}} digits
validationErrors.email: The {{field}} field must be a valid email address
validationErrors.ext: The {{field}} field must be a valid file
validationErrors.image: The {{field}} field must be an image
validationErrors.integer: The {{field}} field must be an integer
validationErrors.maxValue: The {{field}} field must be less than or equal to {{max}}
validationErrors.maxDate: The {{field}} field must be less than or equal to {{max}}
validationErrors.max: The {{field}} field must be less than {{length}} characters
validationErrors.mimes: The {{field}} field must be a valid file type
validationErrors.minValue: The {{field}} field must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
validationErrors.minDate: The {{field}} field must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
validationErrors.min: The {{field}} field must be greater than {{length}} characters
validationErrors.numeric: The {{field}} field can only contain numeric characters
validationErrors.oneOf: The {{field}} field must have a valid value
validationErrors.regex: The {{field}} field does not match the expected format
validationErrors.size: The {{field}} field must be less than or equal to {{size}}KB
validationErrors.generic: There was an error on the {{field}} field
validationErrors.dateIsBefore: The {{field}} field must be before the {{comparisonField}} field
validationErrors.maxlength: The {{field}} field must be less than or equal to {{num}} characters
validationErrors.minlength: The {{field}} field must be greater than or equal to {{num}} characters
validationErrors.passwordsAreNotEquals: The password fields must be equal
validationErrors.passwordInvalidCharacters: The password field contains invalid characters
validationErrors.passwordWeak: The password must contain at least 8 characters, at least one number and at least one letter
